post.author: 이진경
post.content:
Oracle Developer with 8i and Java

  Mastech Emplifi - A New Era in Advanced Technology!

We are currently looking for highly skilled Oracle Developers with Java and XML experience to join our team. In this challenging and rewarding role, you will be responsible for designing, programming, and testing Oracle 8I stored procedures using PL/SQL, Java, and XML. You will be joining an existing team of 20 to assist with the development of this financial services application.

Qualifications:

• 5 or more years of development experience with Oracle and PL/SQL.
• 2 or more years of experience working with Oracle 8i.
• 1 or more years of experience working with XML and Java.
• Previous experience working with ASP and Visual Basic would be an asset.
• Excellent communication skills required.

Mastech Emplifi is one of the most respected and successful IT consulting firms in North America. We pair excellence in technology with a firm dedication to the development and potential of our people. We are proudly ISO 9001 certified in our Toronto, Ottawa and Montreal branches. Mastech Canada services telecommunications, manufacturing, insurance, financial, and government clients. For more information about our company, please visit our web site: www.mastcan.com

If you are interested in pursuing this opportunity, please contact us by sending us your resume in Rich Text Format (. RTF) or ASCII Format (. txt)!

Additional Information
Position Type: Full Time, Contract
Ref Code: SDG-5664  


Contact Information
Mackenzie Brown
recruit_mbtw@ca.mastech.com
Mastech Emplifi
5800 Explorer Drive, Fifth Floor
Mississauga ON L4W 5L4
